Class TagEntropyMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.eval.traintest.metrics.Metric<X>
      • org.lenskit.eval.traintest.recommend.TopNMetric<TagEntropyMetric.Context>
        • edu.umn.cs.recsys.TagEntropyMetric

  • public class TagEntropyMetric
extends org.lenskit.eval.traintest.recommend.TopNMetric<TagEntropyMetric.Context>
    Metric that measures how long a TopN list actually is. This metric is registered with the type name `length`.
